thread.title: Nick Heidfeld earns Mahindra Racing's maiden Formula E podium in Beijing
thread.title_full: Nick Heidfeld earns Mahindra Racing's maiden Formula E podium in Beijing

title: Nick Heidfeld earns Mahindra Racing's maiden Formula E podium in Beijing
text:
Nick Heidfeld earns Mahindra Racing's maiden Formula E podium in Beijing By PTI | Posted 25-Oct-2015 
Beijing: German racer Nick Heidfeld secured Mahindra Racing's first ever podium in Formula E by finishing third in the season-opening Chinese E Prix on Saturday. 
Heidfeld, who started third on the grid, had replaced India's Karun Chandhok in the team for the second season. The other driver Brazilian Bruno Senna, who started seventh, finished 13th. 
Both drivers gained a position before the first corner with Heidfeld challenging for the lead on many occasions. Due to complications during their car swaps, both drivers lost places in the pit stops. Tags:
